landing.noapp: Awudingi uhlelo lokusebenza ukuze ulusebenzise {{ BRAND }} efonini noma kuthebhulethi yakho!
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) kuyindlela enhle yokuhlangana nabangane abasha.  {{ BRAND }}, sikhetha omunye umuntu ngokungahleliwe futhi sikuvumela ukuthi ukhulume ubuso nobuso.   <6>Imibandela</6>, futhi <8>Iziqondiso zomphakathi</8> ukuze uthole ulwazi mayelana nokwenza nokungafanele uyisebenzise {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} ingxoxo yevidiyo ilinganiswe nge-AI kodwa akukho ukulinganiswa okuhle.  {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Kufanele ube neminyaka engu-18 (noma iningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho) noma ngaphezulu ukuze usebenzise {{BRAND}}</0>.  {{BRAND}}'s <4>Imibandela</4> ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe.  <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> kanye namanye amasayithi.
landing.pleaseleave: Sicela ushiye i-Lamdazle futhi uvakashele isayithi yabantu abadala uma kuyilokho okufunayo futhi uneminyaka engu-18 (noma iningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho) noma ngaphezulu.
landing.termscheck: Ngokuqoka ibhokisi uyavuma ukuthi ubuyekeze isivumelwano esizoboshwa {{BRAND}}'s <3>Imibandela</3>, <5>Inqubomgomo yobumfihlo</5> futhi <7>Iziqondiso zomphakathi</7>.
landing.agecheck: Akumele usebenzise le sevisi uma ungaphansi kweminyaka engu-18 noma uneminyaka yobudala yeningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho.  <1>Imibandela</1> ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe. <3>Ngokuqoka ibhokisi uyavuma futhi umela ukuthi uneminyaka engu-18 (noma iningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho) noma ngaphezulu.</3>

chat.error: Iphutha ekuxhumekeni kuseva: Sicela uzame futhi

search.retry: Lokhu kuthatha isikhathi eside, ukufuna umuntu ongamazi esikhundleni...

chat.stopped: Chofoza Qala ukuze uxoxe nomuntu ongamazi
chat.language: Nobabili nikhuluma ulimi olufanayo.  {{"Any"}} kumenyu yolimi ukuze ukhubaze.
chat.simulated: Umuntu ongamazi kungenzeka usebenzisa ikhamera yewebhu elingisiwe

alerts.keepclean: Kugcine kuhlanzekile futhi usize ngokubika ukuziphatha kwe-NSFW
